sentences.sContent: As they travel inland atspeeds in excess of 60 feet a year, they merge with the rich grass andscattered trees of the savanna.
sentences.sContent_eng: As they travel inland atspeeds in excess of 60 feet a year, they merge with the rich grass andscattered trees of the savanna.
sentences.sCn: 它们以每年超过60英尺的速度向内地迁移，融入了热带稀树大草原的丰富草地和零星的树木。

sentences.sContent: A mature male lion rests in the grasses of the Kenyan savanna.
sentences.sContent_eng: A mature male lion rests in the grasses of the Kenyan savanna.
sentences.sCn: 肯尼亚热带草原上，一头成年雄狮正在草丛里休息。

synos.tran: [生态]热带草原；热带的稀树大草原

trans.tranCn: 热带(或亚热带)稀树大草原
trans.tranOther: a large flat area of grassy land, especially in Africa
